Description: Pendant (?): the pendant (or bead) is disc-shaped, made of opaque white glass and is pierced through the centre. On each face a prefabricated black and white twisted cord has been impressed just within the circumference and left in high relief. A central, circular 'eye' in black glass seems to have been formed in place from threads.Glossy surface. The pendant appears to have been made on a mandril.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
